recipes.name: Garlic Butter Pasta
steps: Boil pasta until al dente.
Heat butter and olive oil in a pan.
Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Toss pasta with garlic butter and serve.
recipes.desc: A simple, rich pasta tossed in aromatic garlic butter.

recipes.name: Classic Pancakes
steps: Whisk flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
Mix milk, egg, and melted butter separately.
Combine wet and dry ingredients.
Cook spoonfuls on a hot pan until golden.
recipes.desc: Soft, fluffy pancakes perfect for breakfast.

recipes.name: Chicken Fried Rice
steps: Cook chicken cubes in oil until browned.
Add veggies and sauté.
Add cooked rice and mix well.
Add soy sauce and stir fry until combined.
recipes.desc: Quick and tasty fried rice with chicken and veggies.

recipes.name: Masala Omelette
steps: Whisk eggs with salt and spices.
Add chopped onion, tomato, and coriander.
Pour mixture into a heated pan.
Cook on both sides until golden.
recipes.desc: A spicy Indian-style omelette packed with flavor.

recipes.name: Chocolate Mug Cake
steps: Mix flour, sugar, cocoa, and baking powder in a mug.
Add milk, oil, and vanilla.
Mix until smooth.
Microwave for 90 seconds and serve warm.
recipes.desc: A quick, one-mug chocolate cake ready in minutes.
